2005co2.description: Sensitivity experiment with CO2 concentration fixed at 2005 levels at 378.81ppm.

noco2.description: Sensitivity experiment: only applies to models that take CO2 into account. CO2 concentration fixed at present-day value, i.e. run with transient historical CO2 up to the year 2000 and keep CO2 fixed at 369ppm thereafter.

co2const.description: Keep CO2 concentration constant at 1971 level. For spin-up, use time-varying, historical CO2 concentration until 1970.

nosoc.description: Naturalized - without human impacts on river flow.

pressoc.description: Constant human impacts - present-day (year-2000) dams and water use.

varsoc.description: Time-varying human impacts - time-varying historical dam construction and water use.

2005soc.description: Fixed year-2005 land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input.

1860soc.description: Constant pre-industrial (1860) land use, nitrogen deposition, and fertilizer input.

histsoc.description: Varying historical land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input.

rcp26soc.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP2.6.

rcp60soc.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP6.0.

rcp85soc.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP8.5.

2100rcp26soc.description: Land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input fixed at year 2100 levels according to RCP2.6 in 2100.

ssp1soc.description: Varying society according to SSP1 in terms of population and GDP. (in Health sector)

ssp2soc.description: Varying society according to SSP2 in terms of population and GDP. (in Health sector)

ssp3soc.description: Varying society according to SSP3 in terms of population and GDP. (in Health sector)

ssp4soc.description: Varying society according to SSP4 in terms of population and GDP. (in Health sector)

ssp5soc.description: Varying society according to SSP5 in terms of population and GDP. (in Health sector)

rcp26socbe.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP2.6. Future forest managed to maximize bioenergy. (in Forestry sector)

rcp60socbe.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP6.0. Future forest managed to maximize bioenergy. (in Forestry sector)

rcp85socbe.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP8.5. Future forest managed to maximize bioenergy. (in Forestry sector)

rcp26socbeb.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP2.6. Future forest managed to maximize bioenergy-biomass in leBray site. (in Forestry sector)

rcp60socbeb.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP6.0. Future forest managed to maximize bioenergy-biomass in leBray site. (in Forestry sector)

rcp85socbeb.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP8.5. Future forest managed to maximize bioenergy-biomass in leBray site. (in Forestry sector)

rcp26sochwp.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP2.6. Future forest managed to maximize harvested wood products. (in Forestry sector)

rcp60sochwp.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP6.0. Future forest managed to maximize harvested wood products. (in Forestry sector)

rcp85sochwp.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP8.5. Future forest managed to maximize harvested wood products. (in Forestry sector)

rcp26soca.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP2.6. Future forest managed to maximize a multifunctional, adapted forest. (in Forestry sector)

rcp60soca.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP6.0. Future forest managed to maximize a multifunctional, adapted forest. (in Forestry sector)

rcp85soca.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP8.5. Future forest managed to maximize a multifunctional, adapted forest. (in Forestry sector)

rcp26socam.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP2.6. Future forest managed to maximize a multifunctional, adapted scenario in solling-beech with focus on admixingnative species. (in Forestry sector)

rcp60socam.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP6.0. Future forest managed to maximize a multifunctional, adapted scenario in solling-beech with focus on admixingnative species. (in Forestry sector)

rcp85socam.description: Varying land use, water abstraction, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input according to SSP2 and RCP8.5. Future forest managed to maximize a multifunctional, adapted scenario in solling-beech with focus on admixingnative species. (in Forestry sector)

2005socsite.description: Fixed year-2005 land use, nitrogen deposition and fertilizer input. In addition, model usually plants the same tree species again or allows for regeneration of the same species. (in Forestry sector)

hyytiala.title: Hyytiälä
hyytiala.comment: Note that an experimental plot of pine contains a lot of data while footprint of flux tower is larger. Please note that the deciduous admixtures only appear in the data at a later stage and hence do not need to be simulated. Only simulate pine and spruce (no hard-woods) and regenerate as pure pine stand

peitz.title: Peitz
peitz.comment: Managed using a weak thinning from below.

kroof.title: Kranzberg Roof Project
kroof.comment: Unmanaged/ thinning from below in past 20 years for all species.

nobc.description: No bias correction was performed on the climate data.

localbc.description: Local data from weather stations used for the bias-correction in e.g. the forest sector.

hist.description: Observed climate and CO₂ forcing used for model evaluation and the detection and attribution task.

historical.description: Historical climate as simulated by the GCMs.

rcp26.description: RCP2.6 climate as simulated by the GCMs.

rcp45.description: RCP4.5 climate as simulated by the GCMs.

rcp60.description: RCP6.0 climate as simulated by the GCMs.

rcp85.description: RCP8.5 climate as simulated by the GCMs.

2005co2.description: CO2 concentration fixed at 2005 levels at 378.81ppm.

2299rcp26.description: Repeating climate between 2270 and 2299 for additional 200 years up to 2500 (or equilibrium if possible), CO2 fixed at year 2299 levels.

fore.description: Unsupported climate scenario from Marine-Fishery sector

key-run.title: Input data self-provided by Marine-Fishery sector and not supported by ISIMIP2 protocol.
